caption: Tunnel Activity
description: Tunnel Activity events report secure tunnel establishment, teardowns, renewals, and other network tunnel specific actions.
name: tunnel_activity

client_interface.description: The client interface of the tunnel. In a tunnelled session, this is the interface of the client which requested the tunnel. Ex: en0. The IP is usually a public (WAN) IP.

session.caption: Tunnel Session
session.description: The session associated with the tunnel activity.

traffic.description: Traffic refers to the amount of data moving across the tunnel at a given point of time. Ex: bytes_in and bytes_out.

tunnel_interface.description: The interface of a tunnel. In a tunnelled session, this is the virtual interface. Ex: utun1. The IP is usually a private (local rfc-1918) IP.

user.description: The user associated with the tunnel activity.
